'''Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex''' is [[Fischl]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|Thundering Retribution|0.67}}
* Thundering Retribution DMG counts as an [[Elemental Skill]] DMG.
* Thundering Retribution targets the closest enemy to the character.<ref>KeqingMains Theorycrafting Library:  [https://library.keqingmains.com/evidence/characters/electro/fischl#fischls-a4-targeting Fischl A4 Targeting]</ref>
* Thundering Retribution can only occur once every '''0.5s'''.
* [[Quicken]] and [[Aggravate]] count as Electro reactions. [[Spread]] does not count as an Electro reaction and thus will not trigger this passive.<ref>KeqingMains Theorycrafting Library: [https://library.keqingmains.com/evidence/characters/electro/fischl#spread-does-not-trigger-fischl-a4 Fischl]</ref>
